Generate 40 high-quality flashcards (10 per first two scaffolding layers, 20 for last two) strictly following the schema: {question, correct_answer, distractors: [3 items], explanation, tags}. Incorporate: - Learning Objectives: [insert full list above] - Scaffolding Layers: Distribute evenly – Layer 1: basic recall; Layer 2: components/examples; Layer 3: config steps/vulns; Layer 4: comparisons/integration. - Active Learning: Weave hints (e.g., 'Relates to peer teaching: curl validation'). - Distractor Protocol: [insert full protocol]. - Ensure accuracy: Correct definition (NOT generic AppSec integration); include plist/ASA examples, vulns (wildcard misuse), Apple refs. Output ONLY valid JSON array of 40 flashcards. No extra text.
